trans-unit.source: Specifies the security policy components to be used by the host security manager.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os componentes de política de segurança a serem usados pelo gerenciador de segurança do host.
Usar todos os componentes de política de segurança.
Usar a evidência de domínio do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Route calls to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager.DetermineApplicationTrust(System.ActivationContext,System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext)" /> method to the <see cref="M:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.DetermineApplicationTrust(System.Security.Policy.Evidence,System.Security.Policy.Evidence,System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext)" /> method first.
trans-unit.target: Rotear as chamadas para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager.DetermineApplicationTrust(System.ActivationContext,System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext)" /> primeiro para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.DetermineApplicationTrust(System.Security.Policy.Evidence,System.Security.Policy.Evidence,System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext)" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the policy level specified in the <see cref="P:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.DomainPolicy" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar o nível de política especificado na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.DomainPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ResolvePolicy(System.Security.Policy.Evidence)" /> method to resolve the application evidence.
trans-unit.target: Usar o método <see cref="M:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ResolvePolicy(System.Security.Policy.Evidence)" /> para resolver a evidência do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Use none of the security policy components.
trans-unit.target: Não usar nenhum dos componentes de política de segurança.
